Where you want to go...

  • About Us
  • Why choose Us
  • Our mission

I am a travel advisor who has spent much of my life traveling the world. I was born in Paris, France but have lived and worked in more than 20 different countries. I have resided in the United States for the past 20 plus years. My love of travel began when I was a young adult, traveling the world as I worked for an international resort company. It continued as I became a Senior Manager for a Destination Management Company, which I have been doing for the past 15 years.

Get in TouchRead More

I have booked millions of dollars in hotels, airfare, cruises, excursions, and other forms of transportation. This has led me to have thousands of very happy clients. Over time, I have visited 40 countries across five continents, from the bustling cities of Istanbul and Vienna to the rugged landscapes of Finland and Patagonia. I have immersed myself in local cultures, learning to speak several languages fluently and developing a deep appreciation for the diversity of the world.

Get in TouchRead More

My travels have also inspired my business ventures. I now have my own Travel Advising Company called Voyager Traveling that helps others plan their own adventures domestically and abroad. Despite my many travels, I remain grounded and humble, always eager to learn and experience new things. I believe that travel has the power to broaden one's horizons and enrich one's life in ways that few other experiences can match.

Get in TouchRead More

Why Choose Voyager Traveling?

Expertise and Knowledge

We possess specialized knowledge and expertise in the travel industry, including destination information, travel regulations, visa requirements, and insider tips, which can save you time and effort in planning your trip.
Plus we've probably been there!

Customized Itineraries

We can create personalized itineraries tailored to your preferences, budget, and travel needs. We always recommend the best flights, accommodations, activities, and tours to ensure a memorable travel experience.
Plus we've probably been there!

Time and Stress Savings

Planning a trip can be time-consuming and overwhelming. We can handle all the research, bookings, and logistics on your behalf, saving you the stress and hassle of coordinating multiple aspects of your trip.
Plus we've probably been there!

Access to Exclusive Deals and Amenities

We often have access to exclusive deals, promotions, and amenities, such as room upgrades, complimentary breakfast, or special perks, that may not be available to the general public, helping you get more value for your money.
Plus we've probably been there!

Support and Assistance

We provide ongoing support and assistance before, during, and after your trip. We can help with changes to your travel plans, provide recommendations in case of unexpected situations, and offer peace of mind knowing that you have a dedicated resource to rely on.
Plus we've probably been there!

Personalized Service

We offer personalized service and attention to detail, taking into account your individual preferences, interests, and travel requirements. We can ensure that your trip is tailored to your unique needs and expectations, resulting in a more enjoyable and hassle-free travel experience.
Plus we've probably been there!
